markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 347 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=29), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=110), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=181), [Ng](/Deities.aspx?ID=98), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=44), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=195), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=80), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=184)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26). This makes it [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to them instead. If the target uses a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300), the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
name: Invisibility

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 347 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=29), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=110), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=181), [Ng](/Deities.aspx?ID=98), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=44), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=195), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=80), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=184)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
 A creature can’t be seen until it attacks.
</summary>
summary: A creature can’t be seen until it attacks.
summary_markdown: A creature can’t be seen until it attacks.
text: Invisibility Source Core Rulebook pg. 347 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Achaekek, Ketephys, Nalinivati, Ng, Nivi Rhombodazzle, Norgorber, Raumya, Shax, Yaezhing Cast Two Actions material, somatic Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 10 minutes --- Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes invisible. This makes it undetected to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it hidden to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed. --- Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
